reviews.title: Great place
reviews.text: Very nice place to stay. I think hotel deserves 4 stars, the rooms were nice with new furniture, the breakfast was good and the location is great. Would def. reccomend it

reviews.title: Good Location
reviews.text: We stayed in Achat Hotel 9-30 thru 10-2-04. The location was very easy to access by the bus or subway system. The room was clean and nice sized. The breakfast was filling and service was excellent. All of our travels around Munich was by the Subway and it was a pleasant experience. The Oktoberfest was an experience we will not soon forget as well as the many friends we made while there.

reviews.title: Love the Location
reviews.text: Nice place to stay. Westernized as much as possible. Munich itself is a great place to visit. Lots to do, see, eat, and of course, drink.
